name: Fakeway
description:
Notice

Only one monster has been added so far, I'm working hard to add more and more monsters.

The synthesis system is still in the works, as are some of the ground plants.


Introduce

Excavation: underground caves, and dungeons, all need to be excavated before they can be seen.

Combat: Includes melee weapons, long-range weapons and other types of weapons.

Collecting: A large number of monster drops, gathering items, digging items, and synthesized items are worth collecting.

Explore: several different types of underground worlds.


When you first see this game, your first reaction must be, isn't this a skinned Terraria?

Yes and no.

I tried to be different from Terraria in some ways.

If you like Terraria very much, you can try this game. It will also bring you a different experience.
